property.name: hadoop.tmp.dir
property.description: A base for other temporary directories.

property.name: fs.default.name
property.description: The name of the default file system. A URI whose scheme and authority determine the FileSystem implementation. The uri's scheme determines the config property (fs.SCHEME.impl) naming the FileSystem implementation class. The uri's authority is used to determine the host, port, etc. for a filesystem.

property.name: hadoop.security.group.mapping
property.description: The class that provides access to WSO2 carbon groups over web services.

property.name: hadoop.security.group.mapping.service.url
property.description: The URL where WSO2 carbon user group retreival service is located.

property.name: hadoop.security.truststore
property.description: The key store file to use when accessing WSO2 carbon services.

property.name: hadoop.mapred.reporter
property.description: The class that implements the reporting mechanism of Hadoop MR

property.name: hadoop.mapred.reporter.service.url
property.description: The URL where reporting object shoud be stored
